Klasse Client

java.lang.Object
model.server_client.BaseClient
model.server_client.Client
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Runnable
public class Client extends BaseClient
Represents a client that connects to a server and handles sending and receiving messages. The Client class manages its connection to the server, processes input from the user, and displays server messages.

    • Client

      public Client(SelectRobotController controller, String host, int port)
      Constructs a new Client with a reference to the associated UI controller.
      Parameter:
      controller - The SelectRobotController that handles the UI logic.

    • sendPlayerValues

      public void sendPlayerValues(String name, int figureNumber)
      Sends player values (name and selected figure) to the server.
      Parameter:
      name - the player's name.
      figureNumber - the chosen figure number.

    • getRobotNameByNumber

      public String getRobotNameByNumber(int number)
      Retrieves the robot name corresponding to a given number.
      Parameter:
      number - the robot number.
      Gibt zurück:
      the robot name, or "Not Selected" if not found.
